entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or snow mixed with rain changing to rain or snow this evening then to snow late this evening. Blowing snow at times overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 50 gusting to 70 this evening then becoming west 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:17 PM MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and in the afternoon. Blowing snow at times in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:17 PM MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing in the evening. Fog patches. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:17 PM MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
